{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gigabyte |model=GN-BR402W |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM5106 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=AM29LV160 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Parallel |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.gigabyte.eu/products/product-page.aspx?pid=928 Product page]
[http://download.gigabyte.eu/FileList/Manual/comm_manual_gn-br402w_e.pdf Manual]
[http://www.giga-byte.se/Support/Communication/Firmware_DownloadFile.aspx?FileType=Firmware&FileID=144 GPL code for the device (comm_br402w-gpl-11100h.zip)]
[http://www.giga-byte.se/Support/Communication/Firmware_DownloadFile.aspx?FileType=Firmware&FileID=26 ... and the latest FW (v1.11.00h, which is built by the above GPL code)] The external ''USB port'' seems to simply be a connection to an internal [http://lxr.free-electrons.com/source/drivers/net/usb/pegasus.h?v=2.6.36;a=arm Pegasus ('''ADMtek''') USB 1.1 Ethernet controller]. Specifications in this entry are imputed from '''GB''''s GPL code. There may be inaccuracies. ==Additional external links== *[http://product.pconline.com.cn/pdlib/191655_bigpicture986673.html Image shots on '''product.pconline.com.cn'''] *[http://ixbtlabs.com/articles/computex2k2giga/ Stock image and mention (@ Computex 2002) on '''ixbtlabs.com'''] ===Vendor links=== *[http://www.ebay.ie/ctg/Gigabyte-10-100-Wireless-B-Router-GN-BR402W-/111334439#%7B%22Page%22%3A%22%2Fctg%2FGigabyte-10-100-Wireless-B-Router-GN-BR402W-%2F111334439%3F_aset%3D2%26_pcatid%3D706%26_rptype%3D4295%22%7D Item page (ID EPID111334439) on '''ebay.ie''']
